text: One of Australia’s most remarkable natural  borders  gratifications  gifts  compulsions  gifts , the Great Barrier Reef is blessed with the breathtaking beauty of the world’s largest coral reef. Because of its natural beauty, the Great Barrier Reef has become one of the world’s most  chased  chase  seek  sought  sought  after tourist destinations . A visitor to the Great Barrier Reef can enjoy many  coupons  benefits  experiences  expeditions  experiences  including snorkeling, scuba diving, aircraft or helicopter tours, bare boats (self-sail), glass-bottomed boat viewing, semi-submersibles and educational trips, cruise ship tours, whale watching and swimming with dolphins.
